name: Primal Wrath
description:
Finishing move that deals instant damage and applies Rip to all enemies within 8 yards. Lasts longer per combo point.

   1 point  : 70 plus Rip for 4 sec
   2 points: 105 plus Rip for 6 sec
   3 points: 137 plus Rip for 8 sec
   4 points: 173 plus Rip for 10 sec
   5 points: 205 plus Rip for 12 sec
